Summary: just happened to look just above the tree line and saw a very bright glowing solid ball of light falling straight down until it went past the tree line and could no longer see it.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hartland
There were no other sightings in Hartland on or around September 10th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside facing south. i just happened to look up towards the southeast and saw a steadily rapid descending bright ball of light falling straight downwards. i was looking just over the tree tops and could no longer see it after it fell below the tree top line. i heard absolutely no noise, no bang, crack, or boom...nothing. there was no trail behind. just a bright ball of light falling rapidly downwards.
